dialogue.speaker: Dilbert
dialogue.text:
YOU KNOW WHAT
I JUST REALIZED,
DOGBERT?

dialogue.speaker: Dilbert
dialogue.text:
THE LITTLE HAIRS ON
The BACK OF MY HAND -
THEY NEVER GET ANY
LONGER.

dialogue.speaker: Dilbert
dialogue.text:
BEFORE I RESPOND
JUST GIVE ME A
MOMENT TO BASK
IN THE RADIANCE
OF YOUR WISDOM.
